items.title: CNN to lay off hundreds of employees as post-inauguration transformation begins, sources say
items.content: Both CNN and NBC News are planning layoffs this week as newsrooms transition away from linear TV toward digital audiences.
items.contentSnippet: Both CNN and NBC News are planning layoffs this week as newsrooms transition away from linear TV toward digital audiences.

items.title: Stellantis chairman details planned U.S. investments for Jeep, Ram to Trump
items.content: Stellantis' chairman detailed several plans for U.S. investments when meeting with President Donald Trump before his Monday inauguration.
items.contentSnippet: Stellantis' chairman detailed several plans for U.S. investments when meeting with President Donald Trump before his Monday inauguration.

items.title: Family offices are paying executive assistants up to $190,000 a year as demand for talent spikes
items.content: The talent war between family offices and Wall Street has driven up salaries not only for top investment roles but also for administrative staff.
items.contentSnippet: The talent war between family offices and Wall Street has driven up salaries not only for top investment roles but also for administrative staff.

items.title: Retail crime 'queenpin' to pay millions in restitution to Ulta, other retailers for theft ring
items.content: Michelle Mack was accused of running a sprawling retail crime ring that targeted Ulta and Sephora stores across the country and will spend five years in prison.
items.contentSnippet: Michelle Mack was accused of running a sprawling retail crime ring that targeted Ulta and Sephora stores across the country and will spend five years in prison.

items.title: Jamie Dimon says the U.S. stock market is 'kind of inflated’
items.content: The American stock market is in the midst of a multiyear bull run.

items.title: Jamie Dimon says Trump's tariff policy is positive for national security so people should 'get over it'
items.content: Dimon did not get into the details of Trump's plans, but said it depends on how the duties are implemented.

items.title: Netflix to hike prices on standard and ad-supported streaming plans

items.title: Goldman Sachs rolls out an AI assistant for its employees as artificial intelligence sweeps Wall Street
items.content: Wall Street has embraced generative AI faster than any other disruptive tech in recent years because of how adept the models are in replicating human cognition.
items.contentSnippet: Wall Street has embraced generative AI faster than any other disruptive tech in recent years because of how adept the models are in replicating human cognition.

items.title: FDA approves Johnson & Johnson’s nasal spray for depression as stand-alone treatment

items.title: Here are the products and companies most at risk from Trump's tariff plans
items.content: President-elect Donald Trump's proposed tariffs on China, Mexico and Canada threaten to raise prices for toys, cars, shoes, french fries, furniture and beer.

items.title: FAA grounds SpaceX's Starship after midflight explosion, reports property damage on Turks and Caicos
items.content: The FAA grounded SpaceX's Starship pending an investigation into the failure that caused the rocket to break apart midflight after launching on Thursday.

items.title: Unrivaled women's basketball league debuts Friday. Here's everything we know about it

items.title: Ozempic is in the next round of Medicare drug price negotiations. See the full list of 15 medications
items.content: The talks on drugs including Novo Nordisk's Wegovy, GSK's Trelegy Ellipta, and Pfizer's Xtandi will set Medicare prices that go into effect in 2027.
